wikipedia_page.main: John Caine (born in Salford, Lancashire, England) is an author and playwright who was appointed MBE in 1987 for his services to theatre.

response: * John Caine, MBE, FRSA, author ("A Nest of Singing Birds") and playwright ("Mister Lowry", "Reunion", "On the Knocker" )
*John Caine, Founder and Leader, Salford Playhouse.
